name: Shiva Media
tag_list: apps, smartphone-apps, iphone, blackberry, android, palm, app-development, ski, snowboard, travel, lifestyle, android-app, developer, app-developer, travel-app, los-angeles, santa-barbara, mobile, application, mobile-application, smartphone-application, i
overview:
Founded in 2010, Shiva Media is transforming the way mobile phone applications are made, sold and applied. True to their name, Shiva Media is destroying the traditional way that apps are developed and monetized by providing innovative tools for businesses and consumers to envision, develop, and monetize, smartphone apps that contribute to their core business model.

Shiva Media is revolutionizing smartphone application creation by simplifying the process of app development with their custom app building platform. Shiva Media provides easy to implement and cost effective solutions for creating apps for businesses, allowing them to reach the ever increasing mobile consumer.

Shiva Media is well positioned to be a leader in smartphone applications and is currently generating revenue in the highly profitable ski and snowboard market vertical through their PowderNation product line (www.PowderNation.com). Product development for several other industry verticals are already underway including those in test market in limited geographies and generating profitable sales.

Shiva Mediaâ€™s strength lies in the ability to efficiently and affordably deliver apps across every major smartphone platform, including iPhone, Android, BlackBerry and Palm.

For more information about Shiva Media or to inquire about having an app developed please visit www.ShivaMedia.com
